listOfQuestions.question: What is QuizMaster?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: An open source alternative to Kahoot

listOfQuestions.question: What is the primary programming language QuizMaster is written in?
Who is the current owner of the QuizMaster repository?
What command is used to start the QuizMaster binary in Linux?
What of the following game modes are available in QuizMaster?
What does the Classic game mode involve?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Answering questions with a countdown timer
wrongAnswers: Answering questions with no time limit

listOfQuestions.question: What happens if you answer incorrectly in Speed Run mode?
wrongAnswers: You continue to the next question like nothing happened

listOfQuestions.question: What can you customize in the preferences window?
What is QuizMasterLite?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: A smaller version of QuizMaster but still with a GUI

listOfQuestions.question: What feature allows you to edit and make quizzes?
What future feature is planned for QuizMaster?
How do you activate the virtual environment in Linux?
What method is used to update the TextInputVisualizer every frame?
What does the QuizQuestion class do?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Represents a quiz question with correct and wrong answers

listOfQuestions.question: What is the command to run QuizMaster in Windows?
How do you run QuizMasterLite on Linux?
How do you run QuizMasterLite on Windows?
What is QuizMasterTerminal?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: A text-based terminal version of QuizMasterLite

listOfQuestions.question: What command is used to clone the QuizMasterTerminal repository?
How do you run QuizMasterTerminal on Linux?
How do you run QuizMasterTerminal on Windows?
What programming language is used for QuizMasterLite?
What programming language is used for QuizMasterTerminal?
What format are quiz files in QuizMaster-World?
How many versions of QuizMaster exist?
